TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit InstanceCollisionException extends System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommandException

summary.span: 在永久性提供程序期望某个实例处于未初始化状态，但该实例并不处于未初始化状态时，永久性提供程序会引发此异常。

span.span: A persistence provider throws this exception when it expects an instance to be in an uninitialized state but the instance is not in that state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在永久性提供程序期望某个实例处于未初始化状态，但该实例并不处于未初始化状态时，永久性提供程序会引发此异常。A persistence provider throws this exception when it expects an instance to be in an uninitialized state but the instance is not in that state.

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常引发的异常通常包含对 属性中的前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a result of a previous exception typically includes a reference to the previous exception in the property.
